channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from theBalancedBriefNLbreakingNews, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: After a reference to Trump's impeachments is removed from a history museum, complex questions echo

item.title: Rural US high schools are offering more college-level classes, but college can still be a tough sell
